articles.author: Alasdair Gold
articles.title: Postecoglou sends warning to Tottenham stars and reveals what he told them after West Ham defeat - Football.London
articles.description: The Tottenham Hotspur boss has been speaking about the future at the north London club and what will happen in the months ahead
articles.content: Ange Postecoglou has made it clear to his Tottenham Hotspur players that things will 'never be smooth' while he is at the club and revealed what he told them in the dressing room after their defeat t… [+13301 chars]
